Package entities

Class Passenger

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
entities.Passenger
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Passenger
extends java.lang.Thread
Passenger thread and life cycle. It stores all relevant information about the Passenger.

  • Constructor Details

    • Passenger

      public Passenger​(int id, int nBagsToCollect, boolean journeyEnding, ArrivalLounge al, BagColPoint bcp, BagRecOffice bro, ArrivalQuay aq, DepartureQuay dq, DepartureTerminalEntrance dte, ArrivalTerminalExit ate)
      Passenger Constructor. It initiates a passenger thread.
      Parameters:
      id - Passenger Identifier.
      nBagsToCollect - Number of Bags the Passenger has to collect.
      journeyEnding - True if Passenger journey is ending.
      al - Arrival Lounge Shared Region.
      bcp - Baggage Collection Point Shared Region.
      bro - Baggage Reclaim Office Shared Region.
      aq - Arrival Quay Shared Region.
      dq - Departure Quay Shared Region.
      dte - Departure Terminal Exit Shared Region.
      ate - Arrival Terminal Exit Shared Region.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Passenger Life cycle.

      When the passenger arrives to arrival lounge, he ask himself what to do. If his journey has ended and he has no bags, he'll go home. If he has bags, he goes to collect them. In case his journey hasn't ended, he goes to catch a bus.

      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread
